TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressIldasmAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressIldasmAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressIldasmAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 防止 Ildasm.exe (IL 反組譯工具) 將組件反組譯。

span.span: Prevents the Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler) from disassembling an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於屬性的組件或模組，以防止組件或模組使用的反組譯[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). 這個屬性不會防止從組件使用反映檢視。This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection. 請注意，屬性不會封鎖[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)從檢視標頭資訊和中繼資訊。Note that attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from viewing header information and meta-information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用屬性至組件。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]
